PPLoc: Employee Privacy Notice Posted on Intranet.
activities: Jindal is in the plastic material and resin manufacturing  industry. Jindal has operations and employees in the European Union. In furtherance of its prospective and current employees, business operations, human resources activities, and other associated activities, as well for the purposes of maintaining Jindal’s centralized servers and databases in the U.S., Jindal may receive human-resources-related Personal Data from the European Union about prospective, past, present or future employees, workers and job applicants and their family members.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: HR Data (prospective, current and former employees); online; offline; manually processed.
recoursemech: Cooperation with EU Data Protection Authorities
